name: Pediasure Powder Tin
description: Between 1-12 years of age, a child undergoes rapid physical and cognitive development and this needs to be supported by adequate nutritional intake. Ensuring that your child has a complete and balanced diet is crucial. Unfortunately, throughout these growing years, it is common for parents to encounter moments whereby food intake is compromised. Such moments could be when the child is a picky eater or when he/she falls sick. With 34 essential nutrients, PediaSure provides your child with complete, balanced nutrition to support growth and development. The unique Singapore formulation contains 25% less sugar and 25% more calcium. Now enhanced with Arginine and Natural Vitamin K2. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
